column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " So , you guys are n't going to put up your tarps ? "
#Text=Zhang leader says : " What for ?
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " Besides , we like to use the tarp as a blanket .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Finally , someone gets it !
#Text=" Katara says : " You really think it 'll rain ?
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " No , but you can never be too careful , right ?
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " Would you care for some bread , Katara ?
#Text=" Katara says : " So it was you guys who had food !
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " Oh come now , you really think that tribe of thieves is n't smuggling food ?
#Text=Why should my people go hungry when the sneaky Zhangs are stuffing their faces ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , I guess it 's okay if everyone 's doing it .
#Text=So , why does your tribe hate the Zhangs so much ?
#Text=" Gan Jin leader says : " You seem like a smart girl Katara , I bet you would enjoy hearing some history .
#Text=The patriarch of our tribe , Jin Wei , was an earthbender warrior who was assigned an important duty , transporting our sacred orb from the great eastern gate , to the great western gate .
#Text=Taking the orb from the east to the west represents the sun 's rising and setting .
#Text=It was our tribe 's ancient redemption ritual .
#Text=But as he approached the gate , Jin Wei was attacked by one of the Zhang , a vermin named Wei Jin , who looked at the orb with envy .
#Text=That coward Wei Jin knocked Jin Wei to the ground , and stole our sacred orb .
#Text=Our people have never forgotten .
#Text=You can never trust a Zhang .
#Text="
